alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 09 at 2:11PM PDT until April 11 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM PDT MONDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 15 to 25 inches, up to 30 inches possible across the higher terrain. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Oregon Cascades. In Washington, South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
